text: Anna is a true professional and a very pleasant person. I came to the appointment with lower back pain, which completely subsided 2 days after the massage. Anna listens attentively and looks at the patient holistically. Highly recommend!
The lady helped me a lot and now I can live without pain, I recommend

Anna is very dedicated, with a professional approach, she conducted a thorough interview and provides detailed answers. Besides therapy, I received valuable tips for stretching and foam rolling at home. Highly recommend!

I perceive Anna as a very pleasant, calm person. She knows how to listen and shows great commitment to the patient's matters. Improvement in ailments never comes immediately. Consistency matters, which is why I intend to continue seeing Anna, believing it will only get better.

The first specialist who finally freed me from hip pain. For 4 years I struggled with hip pain - I went from physiotherapist to orthopedist and back. Finally, after reading many reviews, I found Anna. One deeply performed treatment and I could already sleep peacefully through the night. It gets better week by week and I can finally function normally - exercise, run, and enjoy long walks. Definitely recommend!

A very well-educated doctor. She immediately understood my disease symptoms and even announced them herself. I purchased a package of treatments because after the first visit, I already felt better right there in the office.
Everything very professional. I received many tips on what to change in my training plan to support knee pain therapy.

I made an appointment with Anna because I had chronic intestinal problems. Thanks to her knowledge, I found out the cause and then received recommendations and a simple meal plan tailored to my needs and preferences. My well-being has improved significantly! I warmly recommend.

I've been to Anna several times and each time I leave extremely satisfied. She helped me with several ailments that I had been struggling with for a very long time and no other specialist could help me. Anna explains everything thoroughly, is inquisitive during the interview, and is extremely pleasant, which affects the entire visit. I will gladly return and recommend her to everyone. Thank you, Anna.
Everything great! I warmly recommend consultations with the dietitian lady.

This was my first contact with a dietitian and after the visit, it certainly won't be the last. The doctor lady explains everything precisely in a very pleasant atmosphere, I felt cared for, I listened to the doctor lady with great concentration and understood many things I was doing wrong. The doctor lady's professionalism, knowledge, and experience I think will bring good results in my case. I recommend the doctor lady 100%.

Yesterday's visit to dietitian Pani Bożena was a bullseye! From the entrance, you could feel a warm, friendly atmosphere. Pani Bożena is a person full of empathy, passion, and enormous knowledge, which she conveys clearly and concretely. It wasn't a "stiff consultation" but an inspiring meeting, after which we left with heads full of knowledge and motivation. The biggest surprise was my skeptical boyfriend, who after the conversation himself proposed a healthy breakfast! For me, that was a miracle and proof that Pani Bożena can reach everyone. Zero judgment, zero pressure, only understanding, individual approach, and full professionalism. She patiently answered every question with a smile. If you're hesitating, there's nothing to hesitate about. She is a specialist with heart and passion. I recommend with all my heart 10/10!

Kindness, professionalism, enormous knowledge! I recommend a visit to everyone who would like to make changes to their nutrition plan or simply consult doubts. The patient also receives a lot of very interesting and at the same time reliable materials after the visit.

A very pleasant and intelligent woman, it's clear that she is a professional in her field and truly enjoys her work. I got answers to all my questions and even more, I highly, highly recommend. I wish there were more people like her, who are devoted to their work and don't just work by template.

I received very extensive and detailed explanations. The visit took place in a good atmosphere. The dietitian lady answered all my questions and doubts. The office is equipped with specialized equipment. I intend to remain under the care of the dietitian lady. I recommend.
Professional approach, enormous knowledge, explained in detail, I recommend!
A very nice lady, empathetic, the right person in the right position, very knowledgeable, I recommend with all my heart.
The visit was very pleasant and productive. The Doctor lady provides interesting and useful information regarding diet, nutrition, and habits. Highly recommend!
The Doctor lady was very nice, explained everything in detail, and helped me look at nutritional matters from a different perspective.
The visit took place in a pleasant atmosphere. I left with a lot of knowledge and advice. Thank you!
